attributes.action: 'Amend the current versions of the Data Protection Act and Freedom of Information Act to include statutory protection for victims of harassment by malicious informants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The purpose of this petition is to seek support for the amendment of these Acts to include statutory protection for victims of harassment by malicious informants .At present both of these Acts have no specific provisions and sanctions which both deter and punish malicious informants from registering malicious information against an innocent victim ( the data subject ) with a third party ( the data user ) and that party using said false information .In my case a malicious informant fed false details to a UK Police Force and this led to my unlawful arrest and detention ,loss of possessions and loss of employment .The Police force refuse to prosecute the
malicious informant and provided protection for an offender at public expense .
